title: Boston Man Indicted for Armed Bank Robbery (United States Attorney's Office for the District of ...
text: ( Source : United States Attorney's Office for the District of Massachusetts ) BOSTON - A Boston man was charged today in U.S. District Court in Boston in connection with robbing a Citizens Bank in Brighton . Kenneth E. Denny, 60, was indicted
